attr.name: clear
attr.description:
Indicates where to begin the next line after the break.
 
 Usage note: This attribute is obsolete in HTML5 and should not be used by authors. Use the CSS clear property instead.

content.description: None, it is an empty element.

omission.description: Must have a start tag, and must not have an end tag. In XHTML documents, write this element as <brÂ />.

parents.description: Any element that accepts phrasing content.
